alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Collierville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Piperton, Fisherville, Kirk and Elba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
